channel.title: Creative Genius on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Creative Genius on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The Hidden Ingredients Behind AI’s Creativity
item.description: Image generators are designed to mimic their training data, so where does their apparent creativity come from? A recent study suggests that it’s an inevitable by-product of their architecture.
